title: Login page not loading
description: User reports that the login page keeps showing a blank screen.

title: Password reset email not received
description: Customer did not get the password reset email after multiple attempts.

title: Payment failed during checkout
description: Transaction declined even though the card is valid.

title: App crashes on startup
description: Android app stops immediately after opening.

title: Dark mode not saving
description: Dark mode toggle resets every time user reopens the app.

title: Unable to update profile info
description: User cannot save updated email or phone number.

title: Notification sound missing
description: No sound plays when new notifications arrive.

title: Search results inaccurate
description: Search results do not match the user's query.

title: Slow loading dashboard
description: Dashboard takes more than 10 seconds to load.

title: 2FA code not working
description: User enters valid 2FA code but login still fails.

title: Language settings not applied
description: Selected language does not change across all pages.
